text:
Image zoom HBO

Can you believe it’s been over half a decade since Game of Thrones first aired? SO…MUCH…has changed in that time, including what our favorite characters look like.

Here’s what they (characters from season one who are also, you know, still alive) looked like in their very first episode and what they look like now.

Daenerys Targaryen

Image zoom HBO

Jon Snow

Image zoom HBO

Sansa Stark

Image zoom HBO

Arya Stark

Image zoom HBO

Bran Stark

Image zoom HBO

Rickon Stark

Image zoom HBO

Tyrion Lannister

Image zoom HBO

Jaime Lannister

Image zoom HBO

Cersei Lannister

Image zoom HBO

Theon Greyjoy

Image zoom HBO

Jorah Mormont

Image zoom HBO

Petyr Baelish

Image zoom HBO

Varys

Image zoom HBO

Samwell Tarly

Image zoom HBO

Tommen Baratheon**

Image zoom ** Originally portrayed by Callum Wharry (Seasons 1 and 2), then Dean-Charles Chapman (Seasons 4-present) HBO

Jaqen H’ghar

Image zoom HBO

And Ghost
title: Then vs now: How the “Game of Thrones” cast has changed since their first season
